# NodakMesh

> North Dakota's off-grid mesh networking community. Resources for MeshCore and Meshtastic protocols.

## About
NodakMesh is a community-driven project building off-grid communication networks across North Dakota using LoRa mesh technology.

## Key Pages
- [Home](https://nodakmesh.org/)
- [MeshCore Getting Started](https://nodakmesh.org/meshcore/getting-started)
- [Meshtastic Getting Started](https://nodakmesh.org/meshtastic/getting-started)
- [MeshCore vs Meshtastic](https://nodakmesh.org/protocols)
- [MeshCore Devices](https://nodakmesh.org/meshcore/devices)
- [Meshtastic Devices](https://nodakmesh.org/meshtastic/devices)
- [MeshCore Wiki](https://nodakmesh.org/meshcore/wiki)
- [Meshtastic Docs](https://nodakmesh.org/meshtastic/wiki)
- [Resources](https://nodakmesh.org/resources)
- [Community](https://nodakmesh.org/community)

## Topics
- Mesh networking
- LoRa radio communication
- Off-grid communication
- Emergency preparedness
- MeshCore protocol
- Meshtastic protocol
- North Dakota
